column1: Little Goat Diner////Do you know what crumpets are? I didn't
column2: and I still think I don't know! Essentially
column3: it's a biscuit shaped chewy pancake
column4: though part of me though it tasted more like a biscuit. Anyway
column5: this was basically pancakes with syrup and chorizo. The chorizo was very weak. Not spicy
column8: it added some gamy flavor to it
column9: without hiding it in its seasonings and spices. When I swept the chorizo off
column11: but this dish is just terrible and worthless!
